mapper.select: SELECT aa.id ,aa.shift_id ,s.date ,e.name AS employee_name ,aa.created_at ,aa.updated_at ,aa.is_approve ,ar.name AS reason_name ,aa.detail FROM test_absence_applications AS aa INNER JOIN test_shift_schedules AS s ON aa.shift_id=s.id INNER JOIN employees AS e ON s.employee_id=e.id INNER JOIN test_absence_reasons AS ar ON aa.reason_id=ar.id WHERE s.date >=CURRENT_DATE ;

SELECT aa.id ,aa.shift_id ,s.date ,e.name employee_name ,aa.created_at ,aa.updated_at ,aa.is_approve ,ar.name reason_name ,aa.detail FROM test_absence_applications AS aa INNER JOIN shift_schedules AS s ON aa.shift_id=s.id INNER JOIN employees AS e ON s.employee_id=e.id INNER JOIN test_absence_reasons AS ar ON aa.reason_id=ar.id WHERE s.date >=CURRENT_DATE AND s.employee_id=#{employeeId} ;
